DataElement.preferredName: Person Diagnostic Imaging Current Clinical Trial Consent Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the yes/no/unknown/site not participating indicator whether consent or permission was obtained from a person to participate in a diagnositc imagingl procedure, a method that uses a visual display of structural or functional patterns of organs or tissues for diagnostic evaluation, as part of the current clinical trial, a type of research study that tests how well new medical treatments or other interventions work in people.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Person Diagnostic Imaging Current Clinical Trial Consent
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the consent or permission from a person to participate in a diagnositc imagingl procedure, a method that uses a visual display of structural or functional patterns of organs or tissues for diagnostic evaluation, as part of the current clinical trial, a type of research study that tests how well new medical treatments or other interventions work in people.

Property.preferredName: Diagnostic Imaging Current Clinical Trial Consent
Property.preferredDefinition: Any method that uses a visual display of structural or functional patterns of organs or tissues for diagnostic evaluation..:Occurring in or belonging to the present time.:A type of research study that tests how well new medical treatments or other interventions work in people.  Such studies test new methods of screening, prevention, diagnosis, or treatment of a disease.  The study may be carried out in a clinic or other medical facility.  Also called a clinical study.:Permission to do something.

Concepts.definition: Any method that uses a visual display of structural or functional patterns of organs or tissues for diagnostic evaluation.
Occurring in or belonging to the present time.

A type of research study that tests how well new medical treatments or other interventions work in people.  Such studies test new methods of screening, prevention, diagnosis, or treatment of a disease.  The study may be carried out in a clinic or other medical facility.  Also called a clinical study.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: patients' acknowledgement and acceptance of participation in a clinical trial.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: the yes/no/site not participating indicator related to the consent of a person to allow the collection of something.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.29 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. ak

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.changeDescription: Updated to add NCIt concept relationship. Updated VM Short Name to be the Public ID to be consistent with current convention for VM Short Name - DW 10-03-2022

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Determination that a value is not relevant in the current context.

Concepts.definition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

PermissibleValues.value: Not applicable, patient less than 18 years old
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Patient Less Than Eighteen Year Old Not Applicable

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Patient Less Than Eighteen Year Old Not Applicable
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.: A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that an object of interest is smaller than another object in quantity or measure or value or status.: A natural number greater than seventeen and less than nineteen and the quantity that it denotes.: A period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun, approximately 365 days; a specific one year period.: Not new, of an earlier time.: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.
A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that an object of interest is smaller than another object in quantity or measure or value or status.
A natural number greater than seventeen and less than nineteen and the quantity that it denotes.
A period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun, approximately 365 days; a specific one year period.
Not new, of an earlier time.
Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: patients' acknowledgement and acceptance of participation in a clinical trial.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ReferenceDocuments.name: I agree to participate in the
ReferenceDocuments.description: I agree to participate in the imaging research studies that are being done as a part of this clinical trial.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text
ReferenceDocuments.description: Imaging sub study in CALGB 140503

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did the patient agree to participate in the CT imaging study

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Patient has given permission for Alliance/NCCTG to store and use his/her MRI or CT scan images for future research

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text4
ReferenceDocuments.description: I agree to participate in the CT imaging study.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text5
ReferenceDocuments.description: I agree to take part in the CT imaging study.

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text_1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Was consent signed for imaging studies

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text_2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did patient consent to having optional PET scan performed for the imaging research study?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text6
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did the patient agree to participate in the PET/CT imaging study

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Patient has given permission to take part in the imaging study and will have the extra MRIs.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text7
ReferenceDocuments.description: Patient has agreed to take part in the imaging study.

ReferenceDocuments.name: PBTC_Text1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did patient consent to MR Spectroscopy?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text8
ReferenceDocuments.description: Patient has given permission to the Alliance to store and use his/her MRI and/or CT scans for use in future research to learn about, prevent, or treat cancer

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text10
ReferenceDocuments.description: Patient has agreed to take part in the imaging study and will have the experimental DXA, and the DXA and PET/CT scans may be used for this study.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text9
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did the patient consent to the optional imaging banking?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did the patient consent to undergo PET scanning as part of treatment?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 04
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did the patient agree to participate in the retina thickness test?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 05
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did the patient agree to participate in the research study on MRIs?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text11
ReferenceDocuments.description: Patient has agreed that his/her MRI image(s) and related health information may be used in the imaging study.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text12
ReferenceDocuments.description: I choose to take part in the imaging study and will have the FDG PET-CT scans.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CCTG_01
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did the patient agree to allow images (CT and other scans) and related information to be banked for use in future health research as described in the optional research consent form?
